mapper.sql: id, name, room_count, hotel_id, desc, rack_rate, deposit, weekend_fare_enable, weekend_fare, mark_modified, breakfast_enable, breakfast_quantity, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at
mapper.select: SELECT category.id, category.name, category.room_count AS roomCount, category.`desc`, category.rack_rate AS rackRate, category.deposit, category.hotel_id AS hotelId, (SELECT ifnull(sum(o.room_order_num), 0) FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_order_room tor ON o.order_num = tor.order_num WHERE tor.room_in_time BETWEEN CURDATE() AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND ((o.pay_type = 2) OR (o.pay_status = 1)) AND o.order_status IN (1, 4) AND o.mark_modified = 0 AND tor.category_id = category.id) bookingCount # 某房型当日预订入住数量 FROM t_room_category category WHERE category.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND category.mark_modified = 0
